LandingPage.textHero: Plan food and drinks with your friends in just a few clicks.
LandingPage.defaulDescrition: Describe your event to your friends in a few words.

LandingPage.TheyJust: Your friends just need to choose, what they want to bring.

MoreForm.text1: Currently, only three people are working on this nice project. We hope you like it a lot!
MoreForm.text2: To move even faster, please let us know what else you need! We are more than happy to receive any of your ideas!
MoreForm.thank: Thanks for sending us Feedback! Your message was send.
